Terms and Conditions of Circle K e-coupon:
1.This e-coupon is valid till XX XXX 2019.
2.This e-coupon cannot be used for reloading Octopus, paying bills, or purchasing electronic recharge vouchers.
3.This e-coupon can only be used at Circle K stores located in the Hong Kong SAR.
4.This e-voucher is not redeemable for cash, and no change will be given.
5.Only 1 e-coupon can be used for each transaction. Each e-coupon to the merchant before payment.
6.Please present this e-coupon to the merchant before payment.
7.In case of any special circumstances, Circle K has the right not to accept this e-coupon.
